ovdesc.p: IAS - 39 requires a strict classification of financial assets and liabilities according to their purpose. This classification is extremely important as it defines various accounting and measurement rules to be applied. The application IAS.CLASSIFICATION is used to define these. Following records will be released:

desc.p: This is the ID of the IAS.CLASSIFICATION file - it should ideally be any meaningful IAS reporting classification such as Loan, Deposit etc.
